abstract: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention releases study finding significant groups of American children unprotected by vaccinations against preventable diseases pose public health threat.
lead_paragraph: Most kindergarten-age children in the United States are vaccinated, but sizable pockets of unprotected children pose a public health threat, according to a government study released.
snippet: Most kindergarten-age children in the United States are vaccinated, but sizable pockets of unprotected children pose a public health threat, according to a government study released.
